text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket looks worse for wear<n>after her anxiety-filled
exit from public<n>training.

She must be shocked about it more<n>than anyone. But with
no remedy,<n>things continue like this until the<n>Derby is only
a few days away.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Being broadcast live on TV is really<n>nerve-racking. I can't
mess up like I<n>did at the Satsuki Sho prerace press<n>
conference.

There's a press conference today for<n>the runners who are
participating in<n>the Derby.

She watches the other athletes on TV,<n>waiting until she's
called in for her<n>turn.
choice_data_list:
Have you thought about what you're going to
say?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Um... A little...

She sounds hesitant as she keeps<n>her eyes on the
television.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
The Derby this year is full of strong<n>contenders. Tell us how
you feel about<n>that.

text_block_list.name: Racer
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, I've been keeping an eye<n>on all my rivals and
how they race. So<n>I understand that they all have<n>serious
skills on the track.

text_block_list.name: Racer
text_block_list.text:
But I've finally made it to this<n>once-in-a-lifetime race. All I'm<n>
thinking about is taking the lead and<n>crossing the finish line.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wow, she knows how to keep her<n>eyes on the prize. I can
tell she means<n>it too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I think I'll say that I've always<n>dreamed of this race—that
I'm going to<n>win it and become a Derby champion.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But... that's not how I really feel. I'm<n>actually terrified of
losing.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, sorry for being wishy-washy.<n>I'm just no good at
this.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Everyone else is saying how much<n>they want to win the
Derby, but I'm<n>probably the only one this scared.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I can barely feel my legs. It's like<n>they're not mine or
something.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You're right. No one's more scared<n>than you are right now.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You're right. No one's more scared<n>than you are right now.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, I knew it. If I go out there like<n>this, they'll all laugh at
me.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm not gonna win the Derby. It's<n>better if I just qui—

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? I can?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
What're you saying?! Even you<n>admitted it! I'm way more
scared than<n>anyone else! I'm the weakest runner<n>here...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: That's exactly why you can win!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: That's exactly why you can win!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
That ridiculous! Only a loser squirms<n>in their shoes at such
an important<n>race!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
The reason why you're more scared<n>than anyone else is
because you want<n>to win the Derby more than anyone<n>
else.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
The reason why you're more scared<n>than anyone else is
because you want<n>to win the Derby more than anyone<n>
else.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Your legs are shaking just thinking<n>about losing. No one is
this serious<n>about wanting to win it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
My mentor said it too. "That long-held<n>dream is a strength
that will serve her<n>well in the Derby."

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You've wanted it longer than anyone.<n>Ever since you saw
the race with your<n>own eyes when you were a kid!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You've wanted it longer than anyone.<n>Ever since you saw
the race with your<n>own eyes when you were a kid!
I hold up her Derby notebook.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh... My notebook.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
When you've got nothing left, the<n>weight of your dream is
going to push<n>you forward—past everyone who<n>doesn't
want this as desperately as<n>you!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The weight of my dream... pushes me<n>forward...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: And then you're going to write it<n>down in this notebook.
choice_data_list: You're going to write us down as Derby winners!
You're going to write us down as Derby winners!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: And then you're going to write it<n>down in this notebook.
choice_data_list: You're going to write us down as Derby winners!
You're going to write us down as Derby winners!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sob... The Derby... The thing I'vewanted my entire life!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I wanna win! It's always been my<n>dream! I'm scared, but I
can't quit<n>now! URAAAAAGH!

As usual, she has to yell through<n>tears when talking about
the Derby.

When I hear her cry echoing out<n>down the halls, I know
it—Winning<n>Ticket is back.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoo! That was a good cry! I mean,I'm always crying, but that wasan especially good one, hehe.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Do you know what you want to say<n>to the reporters?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm terrified about losing, but my will<n>to win is as great as
my fear! After all,<n>I've got a big dream to fulfill!
choice_data_list: Then let's make sure everyone knows that.
Then let's make sure everyone knows that.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right! Now I'm really raring to go!<n>DEEERBYYYYY!
Knock, knock, knock...

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Sorry to intrude. Winning Ticket,<n>you're up next.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Okay! I'm ready for it!

As she and Tazuna make to leave,<n>we hear a familiar name
from the TV.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text: All right, next we have Narita Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's Taishin! Sorry, Ms. Tazuna!<n>Can you wait just a
minute?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Very well, just one minute...

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
It looks like you've been training very<n>hard, Ms. Taishin.
You don't seem to<n>let up, even after winning the Satsuki<n>
Sho.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Of course. My opponents aren't<n>sitting quiet after they lost
the Satsuki<n>Sho. So I can't take it easy either. I<n>won't let
this slip by me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
The only thing my rivals are going to<n>see in the Derby is my
back.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Taishin's definitely going to be<n>bringing her A game again.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Taishin's definitely going to be<n>bringing her A game again.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sure, but I'll be the one in front this<n>time!

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text: Moving on, here is Biwa Hayahide.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hayahide! Ms. Tazuna, just one<n>more minute!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: What?! But you're on immediately<n>after her!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: She's an Umamusume. She can get<n>her there in an instant!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Not you too! This is live television!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I was able to make it to the Derby<n>due in no small part to the
existence of<n>my rivals.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
When my peers got one step ahead, I<n>strove to take two. In
doing so, we<n>pushed each other forward to make it<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
However, simply being in the race<n>isn't the goal. My aim is
to race<n>against my rivals and win.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, let's do it, Hayahide!
choice_data_list:
Catch up to them, and then keep going right
past!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'll run like never before! Our<n>Derby is going to be the
greatest<n>Derby ever!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Now that my mind's made up, I have<n>to get moving right this
moment! Super<n>sorry, Ms. Tazuna, but I'm skipping<n>the
press conference!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Whaaat?! S-stop right there, Winning<n>Ticket!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, she needs to be at peak<n>performance, so there's no
time to<n>spare.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: You couldn't have told me that<n>sooner?!

Winning Ticket runs off once again,<n>but this time, it's toward
the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaagh! Faster! Faster, faster!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
So that's why she didn't come to the<n>conference—she was
running.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Yes, but... why is she running in her<n>uniform?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Haha, that's just the way she is.<n>When it comes to the
Derby, nothing'll<n>stop her from running.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'M GONNA WIIIN! DEEEEERBYYYYY!

Her pure passion for the Derby can<n>be heard in her
resounding footsteps<n>as she blasts toward the racetrack.
